Sentencas: Cu-free and Cu-doped LSM system, La0 center dot 8Sr0 center dot 2Mn1 -aEuro parts per thousand x Cu (x) O3 -aEuro parts per thousand delta (x = 0, 0 center dot 2), with perovskite structure were prepared using an EDTA combined citrate process and the effects of Cu ion at B-site were investigated.
Titulo: Mn valence state and electrode performance of perovskite-type cathode La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-x CuxO3-δ (x=0, 0.2) for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity and polarization resistance of the Cu-doped LSM were 210 S center dot cm (-aEuro parts per thousand 1) at 750 A degrees C, and 2 center dot 54 Omega center dot cm(2) at 800 A degrees C, respectively which were better than those of the Cu-free LSM.
Titulo: Mn valence state and electrode performance of perovskite-type cathode La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-x CuxO3-δ (x=0, 0.2) for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This indicated that the electrode performance of LSM was improved by the addition of Cu.
Titulo: Mn valence state and electrode performance of perovskite-type cathode La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-x CuxO3-δ (x=0, 0.2) for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oxidation state of Mn ions increased with addition of Cu.
Titulo: Mn valence state and electrode performance of perovskite-type cathode La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-x CuxO3-δ (x=0, 0.2) for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The increase in the oxidation state of Mn ions was due to the formation of Mn4 + ions and oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Mn valence state and electrode performance of perovskite-type cathode La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-x CuxO3-δ (x=0, 0.2) for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The addition of Cu ions to LSM systems could lead to enhanced electrode performance for oxygen reduction reactions originating from the change in valence of Mn ions.
Titulo: Mn valence state and electrode performance of perovskite-type cathode La0.8Sr0.2Mn1-x CuxO3-δ (x=0, 0.2) for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
